webscript.description:
Create an ACME Text Document by uploading JSON data with both metadata and content for the text document.
POST body should include JSON such as:
{ "name": "acmedocument2.txt", "docId": "DOC002", "securityClass": "Public", "content": "Some text to represent the content of the document" }
Example curl call:
curl -v -u admin:admin -d @sample.json -H 'Content-Type:application/json' http://localhost:8080/alfresco/service/tutorial/acmedocs
